verses.roman:
tabe bhaṭṭa kahe bahu vinaya vacana
bahu dainya kari' prabhure kaila nimantraṇa

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; bhaṭṭa kahe—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa said; bahu—very; vinaya—humble; vacana—words; bahu dainya kari'-in all humility; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kaila nimantraṇa—invited to dine.
translation: Thereafter, with great submission and humility, Vallabha Bhaṭṭa invited Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to dine at his home.
